data.name: Light of my Life
data.detailed_description:
Nearly five years ago, the death of your wife left you in charge of your two girls. You tried to be the best caregiver you could, but all three of you were scarred and hurt by the sudden loss of the light in your lives. Now your wards have become grown-up adults, and the grief you share has pushed you apart. Will you be able to overcome the barriers of your own making and help your girls rekindle the light in their hearts?

Light of my Life features you as the head of the household, caring for your girls and interacting with your colleagues at work. Interact with them as you try to bring happiness back into your lives. Experience funny, dramatic, romantic and erotic moments as the story unfolds.

Light of my Life is adult Visual Novel about love and loss, featuring humor, sex, drama and romance.

  • Meet a diverse cast of characters to interact (and get intimate) with, including your own girls and your co-workers.
  • Specify your relationship with your girls. Are they merely your wards, or is your relation of a more taboo nature?
  • Chose your path, and decide who you want to be romantically involved or intimate with.
  • Non-punishing story line. The game is designed for a fun and relaxing experience, and won't throw arcane puzzles or "hard" choices with unforeseen consequences at the player.
  • Unique visual style and art-work.
  • Engaging story line and interactive dialogues let you experience the story as you prefer.
  • This is a sex-positive game. There is no sexualized violence, abuse or coercion. Sexual acts include male(main character)-female and female-female.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
